transition.name: Composite and transform
transition.description: Composites second input on the first input with user-defined blend mode, opacity and scale.
transition.author: Jean-Baptiste Mardelle

parameter.name: compositing
parameter.paramlistdisplay: Alpha blend,Xor,Plus,Multiply,Screen,Overlay,Darken,Lighten,Color dodge,Color burn,Hard light,Soft light,Difference,Exclusion,Bitwise or,Bitwise and,Bitwise xor,Bitwise nor,Bitwise nand,Bitwise not xor,Destination in,Destination out
parameter.name: Compositing
